item.title: Version 0.6.7
item.description:
What's New in v0.6.7

  • Scratch Pad for quick note-taking (⌘|) with per-profile storage
  • New Screenshot command with window and full page capture
  • Set as Default button in profile management
  • Fix Insert mode - typing works reliably

item.title: Version 0.6.6
item.description:
What's New in v0.6.6

  • Window screenshot capture with gradient background (⌘⇧S)
  • JavaScript dialog support - native alert(), confirm(), prompt()
  • Default profile support of startup
  • Return to home view when closing tabs or switching profiles
  • Improve some keyboard shortcuts behavior

item.title: Version 0.6.5
item.description:
What's New in v0.6.5

  • Sites view - aggregate history by domain with visit counts and bookmarks
  • Unified History window with Sites/History tabs (Tab key to switch)
  • Favicon caching - site icons persist across sessions
  • Full keyboard navigation for Downloads, History, and Profiles windows
  • Confirmation dialogs for clear history, clear downloads, and delete profile
  • Consistent keyboard shortcuts across modal views (X delete, C clear, Esc close)
  • Disable page-specific shortcuts on home view to prevent crashes
  • Fix layout shift animation on profile window open

item.title: Version 0.6.3
item.description:
What's New in v0.6.3

  • Set as Default Browser command with detection
  • Send Feedback command with app context (version, macOS, hardware)
  • Share with Friend - recommend Flakes via email
  • Link hints now support form elements (inputs, buttons, selects)
  • Status bar feedback system for user actions
  • Fix repetitive notifications even checked remember choice

item.title: Version 0.6.2
item.description:
What's New in v0.6.2

  • Developer Tools panel with Console, Source, Network, and Elements tabs
  • View Page Source (⌘U) with syntax highlighting
  • Network Panel - track XHR, Fetch, and document requests with timing
  • Elements Inspector - DOM tree viewer with Styles, Computed, and Box Model tabs
  • Click-to-inspect mode (⌘I) with element highlighting overlay
  • Allow localhost/127.0.0.1 URLs to load for local development
  • Dynamic user agent version from bundle (Major.Minor format)

item.title: Version 0.6.0
item.description:
What's New in v0.6.0

  • Reflection - AI-powered page analysis that classifies content and generates insights for pages worth remembering (⌘⇧R)
  • Journal - Daily browsing summaries with reading time, topics, and key insights (⌘⇧J)
  • Shield - Native ad and tracker blocking using EasyList and EasyPrivacy filter lists
  • Delete for individual reflections and history entries
  • Improved AI Settings panel and command palette organization
  • Refined About window layout
  • History list shows recent visits at top with time-only timestamp

item.title: Version 0.5.9
item.description:
What's New in v0.5.9

  • Fix Sparkle auto-update installation on sandboxed apps

item.title: Version 0.5.8
item.description:
What's New in v0.5.8

  • Automatic app updates via Sparkle framework with one-click install
  • AI/Search toggle in command palette (Tab key to switch)
  • Tab sidebar always visible by default
  • Display AI provider and model name in command palette responses
  • Auto-switch to Insert mode now works correctly after page refresh
  • Toolbar items positioning on first launch for macOS 15+
